Cessation of PUB Counter Collection Services at NEA Customer Service Centre at Environment Building Collections of payments to PUB will no longer be available at the NEA Customer Service Centre at Environment Building from 1 February 2019. Customers can continue to make payment via internet banking, online credit card and GIRO arrangement . Contact Us How to Reach Us Locations More Information Online Help and Feedback Forms Send us an enquiry or feedback . Alternatively, you can download the myENV App from the App Store and Google Play store to get online help and send feedback. Toll-Free 24hr Call Centre (Local) To contact us, you can call 1800-CALL-PUB*. You may also reach us at 65216470. *Airtime charges apply for mobile calls to 1800 service lines; only calls from regular land lines are free of charge. 24hr Call Centre (International) To contact us from overseas, you can use the following number: 62255782 . PUB Headquarters Address: 40 Scotts Road #22-01 Environment Building Singapore 228231 Singapore Water Academy Address: 80 Toh Guan Road East WaterHub Singapore 608576 Email: pub_sgwa@pub.gov.sg Marina Barrage Address: 8 Marina Gardens Drive Marina Barrage Singapore 018951 Phone: 65145959 65145959 NEWater Visitor Centre Address : 20 Koh Sek Lim Road NEWater Visitor Centre Singapore 486593 Phone: 65467874 65467874 Email: pub_newatervc@pub.gov.sg Getting to NEWater Visitor Centre: Nearest MRT station: Tanah Merah (Exit A) Bus Services available: 12, 24, 31 & 38 Opening Hours: 9am – 5.30pm (Tuesdays to Sundays, including Public Holidays) (Closed on Mondays) Singapore Water Exchange Address : 84 Toh Guan Road East Singapore 608501 Email: pub_sgwx@pub.gov.sg Getting to Singapore Water Exchange: By Bus: 183, 106, 963, 173 By MRT: From Bukit Batok MRT - Bus 173, 189, 963 From Clementi MRT - Bus 183 From Jurong East MRT - Bus 41 , 183 Quality Service Manager Your feedback on our service quality is important to us. For service-related matters, please email us at pub_qsm@pub.gov.sg and we will get back to you within three working days. For issues on water supply, used water drainage and NEWater, you can submit your feedback via the online form . Call our PUB 24-hour Call Centre at 1800-2255-782 1800-2255-782 (Toll-Free Line) or at 6521-6470 6521-6470 to send us urgent feedback on major pipe bursts and water interruptions. If you suspect a scam, you may also call this number to verify if the call you received from a PUB officer is genuine. Whistleblowing Channel PUB Whistleblowing Channel is an independent line for employees, contractors, customers and stakeholders of PUB to report any unethical, fraudulent or corrupt practices, in good faith, without fear of retaliation, for investigation and action subject to applicable laws. Types of whistleblowing reports Electronic Report Physical Report To submit a electronic report: Please go through the guidelines below. Please submit your details in the online form . To indicate that you have read and you agree to the guidelines, please click on the hyperlink "guidelines" to open the window and tick on the check box at the bottom of the page. Please click submit after checking all your info and attached files are included. Guidelines to read before using the Whistleblowing channel: The whistleblowing channel is part of PUB’s feedback channel. Reporting must be done in good faith. To encourage responsible use of the whistleblowing channel, you must identify yourself and indicate your name and contact details in the report. Your identity and the concerns or irregularities raised by you will be treated with confidence and every effort will be made to ensure that confidentiality is maintained throughout the process. In reporting any unethical, fraudulent or corrupt activity, you shall, to the best of your ability, ensure that the information you provide is accurate. Your report should include details of : dates or period of time of the suspected activity staff involved and place (name and location) value of any money or asset involved any external parties involved (name, description and address) how you came to know about the suspected activity any potential sources of additional information about the matter in question This whistleblowing guidelines is intended to provide a framework to promote responsible and secure whistleblowing and protect genuine whistleblowers from any unfair treatment as a result of their report. A whistleblower, whether an external party or employee, makes an allegation in good faith but it is not confirmed by the investigation, no action will be taken against him or her. If, however, he or she has made an allegation frivolously, maliciously or for personal gain, appropriate or disciplinary action may be taken against him or her, as the case may be, including reporting the matter to the police. Upon completion and submission of your report, you will receive an acknowledgement receipt with a reference number. Please keep the receipt for future reference. We are blessed with the opportunity to take this journey as an adventure into something fun… I likened this location as if it were a ship. So a ship’s name would be fitting. I like the names of sailing vessels, trawlers, or ships some are unique. When I said The Guilty Sea Sports Pub, no one said no. And so it goes an adventure into our sports pub as a new addition to our Crabby Bill’s family brands. Even if everyone doesn’t like the name we can agree it’s different.-Matt Sr. Loder. Sign in Here About Bon Appétit The critically acclaimed Bon Appétit Restaurant has been bringing exquisite cuisine, top-notch service, and breathtaking views to Dunedin and Tampa Bay since opening on the coastline in 1976. Guests enjoy panoramic views of St. Joseph’s Sound and a stunning vista that includes Honeymoon Island, Caladesi Island, and Clearwater Beach. Featuring an award-winning menu with an emphasis on seafood and international cuisine, Chef Cirino Cruz and his team focus on highlighting simple, fresh ingredients. Throughout the busy season (January – May), the kitchen team premieres special menu features – a testament to their creative eye and signature style. A full lunch and dinner menu is always available for both our indoor dining room, as well as our outdoor bar and marina café. We are honored to have you at our table and are here to ensure you and your guests have a wonderful meal. Please let us know if we can do anything to make your experience here one to remember.
